document: Transition from a manual to fully automated product launch process.End-to-end orchestration of launch activities without human intervention: 95% of steps automated within 3 months.Real-time visibility into progress, bottlenecks, and exceptions: 90% of launch steps reported live on dashboard. Consistent adherence to launch standards and compliance checks: 100% compliance score per launch. Dramatically reduced launch cycle time: 50% reduction (from 10 days to 5 days) within 6 months. Centralized audit trail for all launch steps: audit logs accessible within 2 hours.

metadata.title: Automated Product Launch Process
metadata.outcomes: End-to-end orchestration of launch activities without human intervention: 95% of steps automated within 3 months.Real-time visibility into progress, bottlenecks, and exceptions: 90% of launch steps reported live on dashboard. Consistent adherence to launch standards and compliance checks: 100% compliance score per launch. Dramatically reduced launch cycle time: 50% reduction (from 10 days to 5 days) within 6 months.Centralized audit trail for all launch steps: audit logs accessible within 2 hours.
metadata.benefits: Faster time-to-market accelerates revenue recognition: 20% faster product-to-market timelines. Fewer manual errors and rework, lowering operational risk: 80% reduction in post-launch defects. Scalability: same framework supports at least 3 product lines concurrently. Better resource allocation frees teams up for strategic work: 20% of PM capacity reclaimed. Data-driven insights improve future launch planning: 30% increase in forecast accuracy.

deliverables.title: Automated workflow engine configured for product launch stages
tasks: Map current manual launch process end-to-end, capturing roles, handoffs, and decision gates
Define functional and non-functional requirements (SLAs, error handling, security)
Evaluate and select the automation platform based on requirements
Design the automated workflow model, including exception-handling branches
Develop and configure workflow logic in the chosen automation engine
Deploy workflow engine to development and test environments

deliverables.title: Integration connectors to CRM, ERP, QA, and marketing platforms
tasks: Identify source system APIs and authentication methods
Design integration architecture and data transformation rules
Build connectors and scripts for each target system
Conduct unit and integration testing for data flows
Implement error-handling and retry logic in connectors

deliverables.title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) updated to reflect automation
tasks: RGather existing SOP documents and process manuals
Identify changes required due to automation
Draft updated SOPs, including new roles and system interactions
Review and refine SOPs with stakeholders and compliance teams
Approve final SOPs and publish on the internal knowledge base

deliverables.title: Dashboard and reporting suite for launch KPIs and exception alerts
tasks: Define key performance indicators and exception metrics
Design dashboard wireframes and data visualizations
Configure dashboard tools and data connections
DSet up real-time alerts for exceptions and SLA breaches

deliverables.title: User guide and training modules for launch stakeholders
tasks: Outline training curriculum and learning objectives
Develop user guides, quick-reference documents, and FAQs
Create slide decks and tutorial videos
Pilot training materials with a small group and gather feedback
Finalize training content and schedule workshops
Conduct hands-on training sessions for all user groups

deliverables.title: Regression test suite to validate automation after each change
tasks: Define test cases covering all automated launch paths and exception scenarios
Automate test scripts using chosen testing framework
Integrate regression suite with CI/CD pipeline
Execute regression tests on each build and log defects
Maintain and update test suite as workflows evolve
Generate test coverage and execution reports

document: Transition the client service team away from administrative activities and towards generating sales.70% reduction in time spent on administrative tasks per team member within 6 months. Increase client-facing activities to 60% of total workload within 3 months. Drive a 25% uplift in upsell and cross-sell revenue per quarter. Achieve 100% CRM data accuracy through automated data capture. 90% team proficiency in core sales methodologies by the end of Q2.

metadata.title: Transitioning Service to Sales
metadata.outcomes: 70% reduction in time spent on administrative tasks per team member within 6 months. Increase client-facing activities to 60% of total workload within 3 months. Drive a 25% uplift in upsell and cross-sell revenue per quarter. Achieve 100% CRM data accuracy through automated data capture. 90% team proficiency in core sales methodologies by the end of Q2.
metadata.benefits: Boost quarterly sales by an estimated Â£500k through increased upsells. Improve client satisfaction, reflected in a 15% rise in Net Promoter Score (NPS). Enhance team engagement with a 20% reduction in turnover rates. Recover 15 hours per week per team member previously spent on admin. Create a scalable service-to-sales model applicable to other client teams.

deliverables.title: Administrative Process Automation
tasks: Map current admin workflows and time allocation
Identify high-volume, repetitive tasks for automation
Deploy automation in a pilot group
Roll out automation across the entire client service team

deliverables.title: Sales Enablement Program
tasks: Conduct a sales skills gap analysis
Define sales objectives, KPIs, and compensation alignment
Create training curriculum and e-learning modules
Pilot training, assess proficiency, and refine content

deliverables.title: CRM Enhancement and Integration
tasks: Configure fields, triggers, and task assignments
Train team on CRM best practices

document: Consolidate disparate data sources into a single source of truth.100% identification and cataloguing of all data sources within 4 weeks. 90% of critical data mapped and integrated into the unified repository within 3 months. 75% reduction in time spent on data preparation for reporting within 6 months. 99.5% data accuracy ensured through validation and cleansing rules. Real-time data access with sub-5-second query response for dashboards.

metadata.title: Consolidating Data Sources
metadata.outcomes: 100% identification and cataloguing of all data sources within 4 weeks. 90% of critical data mapped and integrated into the unified repository within 3 months. 75% reduction in time spent on data preparation for reporting within 6 months. 99.5% data accuracy ensured through validation and cleansing rules. Real-time data access with sub-5-second query response for dashboards.
metadata.benefits: 50% faster insights generation accelerates decision-making. 30% increase in stakeholder trust via consistent, high-quality data. 25% reduction in data management costs. 40% faster audit readiness. 60% boost in self-service analytics adoption.

deliverables.title: Data Source Inventory and Assessment
tasks: Map and document all data sources
Classify data by domain, sensitivity, usage

deliverables.title: Unified Data Model and Schema
tasks: Define target data domains and core entities
Establish naming conventions and data types

deliverables.title: Data Quality and Mastering
tasks: Define quality rules and validation checks

deliverables.title: Documentation and Training
tasks: Create data catalog and user guide
